amendatorysection.chaptername: State University, State Colleges, And Postsecondary Education
amendatorysection.para: No person shall be deprived of the privileges of this institution because of age, sex, color or nationality.

annotation.para: This section does not create a property interest sufficient to support an action alleging reverse sex discrimination in an intercollegiate sport. Fluitt v. University of Nebraska, 489 F.Supp. 1194 (D. Neb. 1980).
